Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near 132nd/Langley
ShortDescription: NB 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Langley, 131st, Ellis, 130th, Eberhart, due to, street blockage, near 132nd/Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via: Langley, 131st, Ellis, 130th, and Eberhart, due to, street blockage, near 132nd/Langley.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Reroute near Northwest Highway/Ozanan
ShortDescription: 68 NW Highwy buses temp.rerouted NB: NW Highwy, Ozark, Olmstead; SB: NW Highwy, Washington, Summit, Ozark, NW Highwy, near Northwest Highwy/Ozanan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage, near Northwest Highwy/Ozanan.

Northbound buses will operate via: Northwest Highway, Ozark, Olmstead.

Southbound buses will operate via: Northwest Highway, Washington, Summit, Ozark, Northwest Highway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Pulaski/Lake.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Pulaski/Lake. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
